attributes.action: Clarification of Israeli support to Argentina during the Falklands War
attributes.additional_details: Given the 2011 claims that Israel supplied military equipment (including air to air missiles) to Argentina during the 1982 Falklands War, Israel should be required to confirm whether or not such shipments took place. If they did take place, Israel should be required to pay compensation to the next of kin of all British servicemen killed or wounded after the date on which the first shipment reached Argentina.
